column4: i'm assuming you downloaded this off the internet, and saved it in your home director, cookiemonstergri?
the FPS I get on a FPS is about.... 50
I don't expect much from this, actually, it's an  old-ass card
hmmm, what's the LaTeX way of putting a title text smack dab in the middle of the page? you just draw the title then add a page break, or something?
Try The not-so-short introduction (lshort.pdf), a decent book, or use LyX
I'm using the former, right now
it belongs where Caps Lock is
can you tell me why some of the most useless keys ever are on your home row?
my home row on the other hand is A O E U
but then that means you can't type "asdf" so quickly :o)
one hand has all the vowels on the home row, the other hand has the most used consonants and consonant pairs
odd the double-standard there, Linux is adjustable but Dvorak is not ;)
